LanguageData.ATR_Install_AutonomousCore.label: Install autonomous core
LanguageData.ATR_Install_AutonomousCore.description: Installs and connects an autonomous core. After repair stims connect the central networking, the core will be able to store an intelligence - either copied from the SkyMind network or freshly generated.
LanguageData.Install_ReceiverCore.label: Install receiver core
LanguageData.Install_ReceiverCore.description: Installs and connects a receiver core. After repair stims connect the central networking, the core will be able to host remote controllers and act as a surrogate. It will have no intelligence or functionality on its own, however.
LanguageData.ATR_Install_SkyMindReceiver.label: Install SkyMind receiver
LanguageData.ATR_Install_SkyMindReceiver.description: Installs and initializes a receiver in the subjects brain. Whatever intelligence may be stored in the brain will die, and the subject will become a surrogate.
LanguageData.ATR_RemoveSkyMindReceiver.label: remove SkyMind receiver
LanguageData.ATR_Install_SkyMindTransceiver.label: Install SkyMind transceiver
LanguageData.ATR_Install_SkyMindTransceiver.descripti: Installs and initializes a transceiver in the subjects brain. The pawn will be able to access the SkyMind network freely.
